member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR_OUTPUT
member.summary: Specifies the output parameters for calls to .

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR_OUTPUT.pMotionVectorHeap
member.summary: An containing the resolved motion estimation vectors. Motion vectors are resolved to a 2D texture. The resolved data is a signed 16-byte integer with quarter PEL units with the X vector component stored in the R component and the Y vector component stored in the G component. Motion vectors are stored in a 2D layout that corresponds to the pixel layout of the original input textures.
